TITLE: See inside Ford's new tech campus, a century-old Detroit train station restored for $950 million
SUMMARY: Ford Chair Bill Ford Jr., who spearheaded the project, said the 30-acre campus will be key for the automaker's talent acquisition and retention.

TITLE: Hurricane season will bring 4 to 7 major storms, NOAA predicts. How to prevent catastrophic damage to your home
SUMMARY: Scientists are forecasting "above-normal" activity for this year's hurricane season. How to prepare your home, as hurricane damage can be costly.

TITLE: Luxury homebuyers can now get an art collection as part of the deal
SUMMARY: Realtors are going beyond "staging" a property with art and furniture and are hiring experts to curate art collections for homes.

TITLE: Asia's top 4 up-and-coming rental markets that may be challenging traditional property hubs
SUMMARY: Bangkok, Ho Chi Minh, Jakarta and Manila are leading the recovery in Asia's rental growth in 2024, according to JLL.

TITLE: Pending home sales in April slump to lowest level since the start of the pandemic
SUMMARY: Pending home sales were down in every region of the country, but they fell hardest in the Midwest and West.

TITLE: 37% of Americans paid a late fee in the last 12 months, report finds
SUMMARY: More than one-third of Americans have recently fallen behind on a bill, such as credit cards, utilities or rent, according to NerdWallet. Here's what to do.

TITLE: Weekly mortgage demand drops to three-month low, as rates begin climbing again
SUMMARY: After a brief pullback during much of May, mortgage rates began rising again last week.

TITLE: Meet the art collectors with home galleries: 'The stock market doesn't give me any fulfillment'
SUMMARY: Christian Levett opens his home for tours of his collection, while Grant Cardone prefers art to the stock market. The Boros family live above their art museum.

TITLE: A 20% down payment is 'definitely not required' to buy a house, economist says. Here's how much you need
SUMMARY: While coming up with a bigger down payment can help alleviate monthly homeownership costs, 20% is not required, experts say. Here's how much you need.

TITLE: Sales of newly built homes tank in April, as prices and interest rates rise
SUMMARY: Higher mortgage rates were hampering sales of newly built homes in April.

TITLE: Home sales slipped unexpectedly in April, despite big gains in supply
SUMMARY: Inventory in April rose 9% month to month and was up 16% from the year before, but still just a 3.5-month supply at the current sales pace.

TITLE: Denver's business boom has created labor and housing shortages
SUMMARY: From 2010 to 2020, the population of Denver, Colorado, grew by almost 20%. Now, the city is facing both housing and labor shortages.

TITLE: Weekly mortgage refinance demand revives as interest rates fall to 7-week low
SUMMARY: Total mortgage application volume rose 1.9% compared to the previous week, according to the Mortgage Bankers Association's seasonally adjusted index.

TITLE: The decision to sell your home vs. rent it out is 'complicated,' experts say — what to know
SUMMARY: If you are sitting on a low-interest-rate mortgage and ready to move, you could face the decision of whether to sell or rent out your property.

TITLE: Some millennials, Gen Zers plan to tap into retirement savings to buy a home. They 'really shouldn't,' advisor says
SUMMARY: While tapping into your 401(k) savings to buy a home may seem like an investment, it can really hurt you. A 401(k) loan may be better, but it, too, has risks.

TITLE: Here's where rents are rising — and where they're falling
SUMMARY: Of the nation's 20 largest cities, Seattle saw the highest year-over-year increase in single-family rents, followed by New York and Boston.

TITLE: China's sweeping measures to prop up the property sector will need time to show results
SUMMARY: China's sweeping moves on Friday to increase support for real estate will take time to show results, analysts said.

SUMMARY: Newly built homes make up a higher share of the available housing stock in the U.S. Here's what to consider as a buyer on the market.

TITLE: These home remodeling projects offer the highest return on investment in history, report finds
SUMMARY: Not all home renovations deliver the same return on investment, but some can pay off twofold, according to a recent report.

TITLE: 'Quiet wealth' takes on new meaning with super-private deals for mansions, art and classic cars
SUMMARY: Last year, while combined public auction sales for Sotheby's, Christie's and Phillips fell by 19%, private sales rose.

TITLE: China pledges $42 billion in a slew of measures to support the struggling property sector
SUMMARY: Chinese authorities on Friday pledged new support for state-owned enterprises to enable them to buy unsold apartments.

TITLE: Mortgage demand from homebuyers drops even as interest rates pull back to April lows
SUMMARY: Total mortgage application volume increased just 0.5% from one week earlier, according to the Mortgage Bankers Association's seasonally adjusted index.

TITLE: A 20% home down payment isn't 'the law of the land,' analyst says. Here's how much people are paying
SUMMARY: Homebuyers are making bigger down payments, but the average is well below 20%. While the share is considered a standard, it's not "the law of the land."

TITLE: Your home sale could trigger capital gains taxes. Here's how to calculate your bill
SUMMARY: Home prices are rising, and selling your primary home could trigger capital gains taxes. Here is how to calculate your tax bill.

TITLE: Displaying art in your home? Here are some do's and don'ts
SUMMARY: Where and how to hang pictures and other artworks can feel like a challenge. CNBC spoke to experts for their display tips.

TITLE: Australia's budget is expected to target housing crisis as prices keep climbing
SUMMARY: Treasurer Jim Chalmers is set to deliver the budget on Tuesday, which is expected to focus on addressing the nation's housing crisis.

TITLE: ‘I feel like I've been tricked’: Some property buyers in China’s Tianjin have been waiting 8 years for their homes
SUMMARY: A group of around 1,500 homebuyers have yet to see the apartments they paid for about eight years ago, as challenges persist in China's property sector.

TITLE: Fewer homeowners are remodeling, but demand is still 'solid'
SUMMARY: Many Americans were renovating their homes early in the Covid-19 pandemic, boosting remodel activity up until 2022. That's no longer the case.

SUMMARY: Buying a property abroad can be a dream for many Americans. But it's not a decision one should make on whim; multiple factors can easily complicate the process.

TITLE: Weekly mortgage refinance demand rose 5% after a slight dip in mortgage rates
SUMMARY: Mortgage rates are significantly higher than they were at the start of 2024, they pulled back slightly last week but several weeks of straight increases.
